name: SenseCAP Card Tracker T1000-E
description: High-performance, credit card-sized LoRa tracker for Meshtastic. Features Semtech LR1110 (863-928 MHz) for LoRa, Nordic nRF52840 MCU for Bluetooth 5.1, Thread, Zigbee, and Mediatek AG3335 GPS for accurate location tracking. Includes 700mAh rechargeable battery, IP65 rating, 3-axis accelerometer, temperature and light sensors, USB magnetic charging, and open-source Meshtastic firmware. Rugged, portable, and ideal for off-grid communication, asset tracking, and outdoor adventure.

name: Wio Tracker L1 Pro
description: Low-power, scalable Meshtastic node with LoRa (862–930 MHz), Nordic nRF52840 MCU, L76K GPS, 1.3-inch OLED display, rechargeable battery, and durable 3D-printed enclosure. Pre-flashed with Meshtastic firmware, supports Bluetooth 5.0, and offers triple power supply options (USB Type-C, solar, Li-ion). Fully compatible with Grove ecosystem and includes PTH headers and SWD debugging interface.

name: Wio SX1262 with XIAO ESP32S3
mcu: ESP32-S3R8, Xtensa LX7 dual-core, 32-bit, up to 240 MHz

name: SenseCAP Card Tracker T1000-B
description: Card-size LoRaWAN tracker for indoor and outdoor positioning. Utilizes GNSS, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth for precise tracking. Features temperature, light, and motion sensors, panic button, buzzer, and IP65 rating. 700mAh battery, magnetic charging, and up to 4 months battery life. Ideal for logistics, asset tracking, and safety applications.

name: SenseCAP Indicator D1L
description: 4-inch capacitive touch screen IoT development platform powered by ESP32S3 & RP2040 dual-MCU. Supports Wi-Fi, BLE, and LoRa (SX1262). Open-source, with rich GPIOs, Grove expansion, and built-in tVOC and CO2 sensors. Ideal for dashboards, air quality monitoring, and smart home applications.
mcu: ESP32-S3 (Xtensa LX7 dual-core, 240MHz), RP2040 (Dual ARM Cortex-M0+, 133MHz)

name: R1 with External Antenna - Complete Meshtastic Device powered by RAKwireless®
R1 - Complete Meshtastic Device powered by RAKwireless®
H1 - Complete Device with upgraded whip antenna: Heltec V3 running Meshtastic®
H1 - Complete Device: Heltec V3 running Meshtastic®
Seeed Studio SenseCAP Card Tracker T1000-E
Limited Edition: 1st Anniversary H2T Combo - Device and Holster
H2T - Complete Device: Heltec T114 with GPS running Meshtastic®
Heltec MeshPocket - Integrated Qi2 Power Bank
Walter
description: Open source cellular, GPS, and WiFi/BLE module. Combines ESP32-S3 SoC with Sequans GM02SP LTE-M/NB-IoT 5G modem and GNSS receiver. Features Wi-Fi b/g/n, Bluetooth 5.0, ultra-low power deep sleep, and is pin-compatible with PyCom GPy. Fully certified (FCC, CE, UKCA, IC, RCM). Open hardware and software.
mcu: ESP32-S3 (dual-core 32-bit, 16MiB flash, 2MiB RAM, RISC-V ULP co-processor)

name: M1 Meshtastic Radio
description: Fully assembled or case-only modular Meshtastic radio with RAK WisBlock, 2000mAh battery, USB-C charging, and optional GPS/sensors. No display.

name: Beacon Solar Meshtastic Node
description: Solar-powered, outdoor Meshtastic node with 5000mAh battery, IP67 enclosure, multiple mounting options, and LoRa/Bluetooth radios.

name: MeshPocket Qi2 Magnetic Charging Power Bank
T-Watch S3
description: Open-source smartwatch with LoRa and ESP32-S3. Features 16MB flash, 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth 5.0, RTC, microphone, MAX98357A, power detection, BMA423 3-axis accelerometer, DRV2605 haptic driver, AXP2101 power management, and SX1262 LoRa transceiver (433/868/915 MHz). Highly customizable for wearable and IoT applications.

name: T-Deck Plus Meshtastic
description: Upgraded T-Deck with added GPS module and built-in 2000mAh battery. Features ESP32-S3FN16R8 dual-core LX7, 16MB flash, 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5, 2.8-inch 320x240 IPS LCD, SX1262 LoRa transceiver (433/868/915 MHz), GPS, TF card, microphone, speaker. Ideal for portable messaging and IoT projects.

name: T-Echo Meshtastic
description: Compact LoRa device with nRF52840 MCU, 2MB flash, 2MB RAM, Bluetooth 5, Thread, Zigbee, SX1262 LoRa transceiver (433/868/915 MHz), 1.54-inch SPI E-Paper display (200x200), L76K GNSS (GPS, GLONASS, BeiDou, QZSS), 850mAh battery, ABS enclosure, and optional BME280 sensor. FCC, CE, MIC certified.

name: T-Beam Meshtastic
description: ESP32-based LoRa device with SX1276/SX1278 transceiver (433/868/915/923 MHz), NEO-6M GPS, 0.96-inch OLED display, 4MB flash, 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, 18650 battery holder, USB Micro charging. Ideal for Meshtastic and Arduino projects.

name: T3 S3 Meshtastic
description: ESP32-S3-based LoRa development board with 0.96-inch display. Supports SX1280 2.4G (with/without PA), SX1276 (868/915 MHz), SX1262 (868/915 MHz). Features Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Meshtastic firmware compatibility. Ideal for IoT and radio projects.

name: T-Beam SUPREME Meshtastic
description: Advanced LoRa device with ESP32-S3FN8, 8MB flash, 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5, SX1262 LoRa transceiver, L76K or UBLOX GPS, six-axis IMU QMI8658, 0.96-inch OLED, multiple frequency options (433/868/915 MHz), and USB-C charging. Ideal for advanced Meshtastic and IoT applications.

name: T-Deck Meshtastic
description: Pocket-sized device with ESP32-S3FN16R8 dual-core LX7, 16MB flash, 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5, 2.8-inch 320x240 IPS LCD, mini keyboard, SX1262 LoRa transceiver (433/868/915 MHz), trackball, microphone, speaker, and USB-C charging. Ideal for portable messaging and coding projects.

name: Spec5 Ranger
description: Engineered for adventurers and emergency preppers, the Spec5 Ranger offers seamless technology integration for off-grid connectivity. Ready to use out of the box, lightweight, and features long-range LoRa communication, GPS integration, and a full QWERTY keyboard. Built with a rugged PETG enclosure, 3300mAh battery, ESP32-S3 MCU, and 915 MHz LoRa. Ideal for outdoor safety and connectivity.

name: WisMesh Pocket V2
description: Ready-to-use Meshtastic LoRa mesh device with multicolor PETG enclosure, pre-flashed with Meshtastic firmware. Features WisBlock RAK4631 module, GNSS module, 1.3” OLED display, acceleration sensor, 3200mAh rechargeable battery with temperature monitoring, USB-C charging, SMA antenna connector, and user button. Ideal for off-grid communication and tracking.

name: WisMesh Pocket Mini
description: Compact, ready-to-use Meshtastic LoRa mesh device with powerful antenna performance. Features RAK19003 WisBlock Base Board, RAK4631 WisBlock Core Module (pre-flashed with Meshtastic), 3D printed enclosure, internal PCB LoRa antenna, internal BLE antenna, on/off button, 1000mAh battery, and USB-C charging. No display or GPS. Ideal for portable mesh networking.

name: WisMesh TAP
description: Touchscreen Meshtastic client with GNSS and long battery life. Features a 320x240 TFT touch screen, on-screen keyboard, WisBlock RAK4631 (Nordic nRF52840) MCU, RAK12500 GNSS module (u-blox ZOE M8Q), 3200mAh battery (IEC 62133-2:2017 certified), IP65-rated enclosure, LoRa communication, BLE and USB setup, and flexible mounting options. Ideal for off-grid communication and outdoor use.

name: WisMesh Board ONE Pocket
description: Ready-to-use Meshtastic node based on WisMesh Board ONE. Fully assembled with a rugged 3D-printed enclosure (black, green, or white), pre-flashed with Meshtastic firmware. Features WisBlock RAK4631 (Nordic nRF52840) MCU, Semtech SX1262 LoRa transceiver, 1.3'' OLED display, user button, LED indicators, 1000mAh Li-Ion battery, USB Type-C charging, external LoRa antenna, and WisBlock sensor slot for expansion (optional GNSS). Ideal for portable, off-grid communication and tracking.
